name: Américas Benidorm Hotel
address: Rua Barata Ribeiro, 547, Rio de Janeiro
description: Near Copacabana Beach and featuring scenic views of Christ the Redeemer and the Sugarloaf, this hotel provides a rooftop pool, and gym. WiFi is free. Parking is available at an additional price. Bright and spacious, the air-conditioned rooms at Benidorm Palace display local paintings and framed artwork. They all offer cable TV and a well-supplied minibar, while suites also feature a private sauna and hot tub. Guests can enjoy continental breakfast in Benidorm Palace´s stylish restaurant. Siqueira Campos Metro Station is 550 metres away. Copacabana Fort is 2.4 km from Benidorm Palace Hotel. Santos Dumont Airport is 10 km from the property and Galeão International Airport is at a distance of 22.6 km.Read less

name: Hotel Bandeirantes
address: Rua Barata Ribeiro 548 Copacabana, Rio de Janeiro 22040-000
description: Just 500 metres from Rio de Janeiro’s Copacabana Beach, Hotel Bandeirantes offers a rooftop pool and air-conditioned rooms. Amenities include a gym and a sauna. WiFi is free. Featuring beautiful contemporary interiors, this 3-star hotel provides bright and spacious accommodation. It supplies a modern bathroom, plus cable TV, telephone and minibar. Room service is available. In a pleasant area decorated with classic paintings, guests enjoy buffet breakfast with a variety of tropical fruits, juices, breads and cakes. À la carte Brazilian dishes are served for lunch and dinner. Exotic drinks can be ordered from the bar. Siqueira Campos metro station is 550 metres from Hotel Bandeirantes, whilst Copacabana Fort is 2.2 km away. Santos Dumont Airport is at a distance of 8.7 km and Galeão International Airport is 25.5 km from the property.Read less

description: Ideally located 500 metres away from both Copacabana and Ipanema Beaches, Atlantis Copacabana Hotel provides a terrace with Atlantic Ocean views and a rooftop pool. Beach service is provided and cocktails can be ordered at the bar and enjoyed on the terrace. General Osorio metro station is 650 metres from Atlantis Copacabana Hotel, whilst Copacabana Fort is 600 metres away. Santos Dumont Airport is at a distance of 10.4 km and Galeão International Airport is 27.4 km from the property.Read less

name: Hotel Astoria Copacabana
address: Rua Republica Do Peru 345, Rio de Janeiro 22021-040
description: Located just 300 meters from Copacabana beach, in Rio de Janeiro, Hotel Astoria Copacabana features an outdoor pool, gym and sauna. Featuring a shared lounge, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation offers currency exchange for guests. The rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and minibar. The buffet breakfast is served daily in the dining area. Hotel Astoria Copacabana offers accommodation with a sauna and sun terrace. The 24-hour front desk can arrange hiking trips, shuttle and laundry services. Hotel Astoria is conveniently located only 350 metres from Cardeal Arcoverde tube station, 9.6 km from Santos Dumont Airport and 18 km from Galeao International Airport.Read less

name: South American Copacabana Hotel
address: Francisco Sá, 90, Rio de Janeiro 22080-010
description: South American Copacabana is 250 metres from Copacabana and Ipanema beaches. Rio de Janeiro’s breathtaking skyline can be enjoyed from the sun terrace, by the pool. WiFi is free. Rooms at South American Copacabana boast a contemporary décor, featuring a minibar and a 32” LCD TV with cable access. Some offer a spa pool and additional living areas. Non-smoking room are available. South American Copacabana Hotel serves a daily buffet breakfast in the luxurious restaurant. It offers a selection of hot meals, tropical fruits and breads. Rio de Janeiro’s breathtaking skyline can be enjoyed from the sun terrace, by the pool. This 4-star hotel features a well-equipped gym, sauna and a lounge bar with desktop computers available to guests. General Osorio metro station is 350 metres from the hotel, whilst Copacabana Fort is 1 km away. name: Bossa Nova Ipanema
address: Rua Bulhões de Carvalho, 337, Rio de Janeiro 22081-000
description: Located 300 metres from the famous Ipanema Beach in Rio de Janeiro, Bossa Nova Ipanema features free WiFi access. Guests can also enjoy a spa centre for an extra charge and the on-site restaurant. Each sophisticated room at this 4 stars boutique hotel is air conditioned and boasts an ultramodern décor. Guests will find a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar and a Nespresso coffee machine. All rooms feature a private bathroom with hairdryer. Guests will also benefit digital newspaper. Guests can enjoy a selection of contemporary Brazilian cuisine at the hotel’s restaurant. Bossa Nova Ipanema has a unique style created by the famous Brazilian fashion stylist Gloria Coelho. Copacabana Beach is 300 metres from Bossa Nova Ipanema, while Rodrigo de Freitas Lagoon is 1,5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont Airport, 8 km from Bossa Nova Ipanema. Galeão International Airport is 20 km away.Read less

name: Hotel Atlantico Business Centro
address: Rua Senador Dantas, 25, Rio de Janeiro 20031-202
description: Hotel Atlântico Business is located in downtown Rio de Janeiro, 200 metres from the stately Theatro Municipal. It offers an outdoor swimming pool and a rooftop sun deck with splendid views. The buffet breakfast offers a large variety of options. Free WiFi is available. Rooms at Business Hotel Atlântico are equipped with LCD TVs, air conditioning and a laptop safe. Additionally, they offer a work desk and are tastefully styled with natural and light wood décor. Guests can also sample some local and international specialties at the restaurant. A fitness centre and 24-hour business centre are available. After a relaxing hot tub or sauna session, guests can enjoy a refreshing drink from the bar or order from the room service menu. There is a bike-sharing station nearby. Just 200 meters from the hotel lies the Cinelandia metro station. The stunning Gloria Marina is at a distance of 3 km. Copacabana beach is 7 km away. Santos Dumont Airport is at a distance of 1.2 km and Galeão International Airport is 18 km from the property.Read less

address: Av. Nossa Senhora de Copacabana, 552, Rio de Janeiro 22020-000
description: Located 230 metres from the trendy Copacabana Beach, Mar Palace Copacabana Hotel offers accommodation in Rio de Janeiro. Free WiFi is available. Guests will find a swimming pool, as well as panoramic views of the Corcovado and the Christ Statue. A complimentary breakfast is served daily. This 4-star hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with 32" cable TV. Bathroom is fitted with a hair dryer and free toiletries. Inside the Mar Palace Copacabana, guests will also find a restaurant, a business center and a couple of computers with internet access. Siqueira Campos metro station is 500 metres from Mar Palace, whilst Lagoa Stadium is 4.8 km away. Santos Dumont Airport is at a distance of 8 km and Galeão International Airport is 24.8 km from the property.Read less

name: Windsor Excelsior Copacabana

description: Situated in front of Copacabana beach, Windsor Excelsior offers panoramic views of the ocean and the Sugarloaf. A rooftop terrace with pool, bar and gym is one of its highlights. Windsor Excelsior Copacabana features tasteful rooms with contemporary décor. Spacious and bright, they all have air conditioning, cable TV, WiFi and minibar, while some also offer sea views and a hot tub. Room service is available 24 hours a day. At the restaurant, guests enjoy tropical breakfast with various items, while admiring stunning sea views. Lunch and dinner options are provided as well, featuring Brazilian and international specialities. Amenities include dry and steam sauna units next to the fitness centre. Cardeal Arcoverde metro station is 60 metres from Windsor Excelsior. Beach Volleyball Arena 800 metres away, and Santos Dumont Airport is at a distance of 9.4 km.Read less

description: Located near the beaches of Rio de Janeiro Sheraton Grand Rio Hotel and Resort offers one of the only beachfront resorts with an extensive recreational area, hotel spa and other amenities. Stroll our resort's lush, landscaped grounds, set on a white-sand beach facing the tropical South Atlantic, flanked by Brazils towering mountains. name: Janeiro Hotel
address: Avenida Delfim Moreira, 696, Rio de Janeiro 22441-000
description: Soaking up the breeze, right bang smack on the sand, arms flung wide open to the Atlantic, this is JANEIRO. Located in the middle of Leblon's marvellous beach-culture, we bring Rio's bossa vibe to life. Nature is a joyful accomplice. And what about that view? The Cagarras islands scatter across a horizon blue as far as the eye can see. No make-believe needed here. At night, the Moon beams, and in the distance, the lights of Vidigal glitter and dance like fireflies. Pure poetry for the eyes, woven into the urban effervescence of the city. The barefoot simplicity of the beach finds its way into the smallest of details; from the rooms to the food, the music to the art, all is an extension of the golden sands out front. We sway to no other rhythm but Rio's.iHotelier/iStay
